downloadTitle: Update Rollup 14 for System Center 2012 R2 Service Manager
downloadDescription: This update contains a number of fixes for System Center 2012 R2 Service Manager
detailsSection:
This update contains a set of bug fixes to the System Center 2012 R2 Service Manager release. It should be applied to all Service Manager 2012 R2 server installations.
There are the available executable files:
SCSM2012R2_CU_KB4024037_AMD64_ 7.5.3079.768.exe
SCSM2012R2_CU_ KB4024037_i386_ 7.5.3079.768.exe

Issues that are fixed in this update rollup-
  • Included Support for TLS 1.2
  • New Service Request template gets created without the associated Activities and Related items, if the Apply button is used
  • Change collision error occurs for Work Items of extended incident class types, even if they don’t have any overlapping changes
  • Get-SCOMGroup PowerShell cmdlet fails if the database has large number of groups (in thousands)
installInstructionSection: Please refer KB4024037 for detailed installation instructions.
